snippet: Shares of Shippers Ryder System, J.B. Hunt, and C.H. Robinson all fell, reflecting concern that tepid economic growth would reduce trade volume.
abstract: Stocks plummet as bank and tech shares drop sharply.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Shippers Ryder System, J.B. Hunt, and C.H. Robinson all fell, reflecting concern that tepid economic growth would reduce trade volume.

headline.main: Market Declines on Global Growth Worries
headline.print_headline: Market Drops as Bank and Tech Shares Fall Sharply
